backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types and backend logic for an insurance inquiry platform, including user profiles, insurance plans, inquiries, agents, and contact messages with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four insurance platform features (inquiry form, plans page, contact agent, admin dashboard) to their implementing frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries for each frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable type-conflict fixes between backend Agent and @dfinity/agent types.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Plans, Contact, and Admin pages, and conditionally renders a ProfileSetupModal for newly authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that blocks access to admin content by showing login or access-denied screens based on authentication and admin status checks.
frontend/src/components/AgentCard.tsx: Card component displaying an agent's avatar, name, insurance specializations, phone, and email, with an optional contact button that triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/ContactMessageFo: A form component that allows authenticated users to select an agent, enter a subject and message, and send it via the `useSendMessageToAgent` hook, with login prompt for unauthenticated users and a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/ContactMessagesT: Displays a paginated table of contact messages with sender, agent name, date, and message preview columns, including loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, coverage type list, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/InquiryDetailsMo: A dialog modal that shows full details of an insurance inquiry and allows admins to update its status via the `useUpdateInquiryStatus` hook.
frontend/src/components/InquiryTable.tsx: A filterable table of insurance inquiries supporting type and status filters, with loading skeletons and a view-details action per row.
frontend/src/components/InsuranceInquiry: A multi-step insurance inquiry form that renders type-specific fields based on the selected insurance type and submits the inquiry via `useSubmitInsuranceInquiry`, with login gating and a success state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a NavigationBar, a main content outlet, and a Footer.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Sticky navigation bar component with logo, desktop/mobile nav links, and Internet Identity login/logout button; conditionally shows an Admin link for admin users.
frontend/src/components/PlanCard.tsx: Card component that displays an insurance plan's type, coverage amount, features, and monthly premium, with a 'Get Quote' button that navigates to the home page with pre-filled search params.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and email to create a profile, using the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation on submit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile, insurance plans, inquiries, agents, and contact messages CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter and Merriweather fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system including teal brand colors, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page protected by AdminGuard that displays stats cards for inquiry counts and tabbed views for managing insurance inquiries and contact messages, with a details modal for individual inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page that lists agents via AgentCard components with a pre-selectable contact form, plus office info with address, phone, and email details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner with a gradient overlay, trust stats bar, and a two-column layout with a step-by-step guide alongside the InsuranceInquiryForm, supporting URL query params to pre-select insurance type and plan.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Plans page that fetches and displays insurance plans in a responsive grid, filterable by type (health, auto, life, home) via tabs, with skeleton loading states and empty state handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palette (oklch-based tokens including teal, gold, success, warning, sidebar), typography, border radius, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing an insurance inquiry website with features for multi-type quote forms, plan browsing, agent contact, and an admin dashboard, along with versioning metadata and image requirements.
